00007 #ifndef MECAB_UCS_H
00008 #define MECAB_UCS_H

00010 #ifndef MECAB_USE_UTF8_ONLY
00011 #include "ucstable.h"
00012 #endif
00013 
00014 namespace MeCab {
00015 
00016 // All internal codes are represented in UCS2,
00017 // if you want to use specific local codes, e.g, big5/euc-kr,
00018 // make a function which maps the local code to the UCS code.
00019 
00020 inline unsigned short utf8_to_ucs2(const char *begin, const char *end,
00021                                    size_t*  mblen) {
00022   const size_t len = end - begin;
00023 
00024   if (static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[0]) < 0x80) {
00025     *mblen = 1;
00026     return static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[0]);
00027 
00028   } else if (len >= 2 && (begin[0] & 0xe0) == 0xc0) {
00029     *mblen = 2;
00030     return((begin[0] & 0x1f) << 6) |(begin[1] & 0x3f);
00031 
00032   } else if (len >= 3 && (begin[0] & 0xf0) == 0xe0) {
00033     *mblen = 3;
00034     return ((begin[0] & 0x0f) << 12) |
00035         ((begin[1] & 0x3f) << 6) |(begin[2] & 0x3f);
00036 
00037     /* belows are out of UCS2 */
00038   } else if (len >= 4 && (begin[0] & 0xf8) == 0xf0) {
00039     *mblen = 4;
00040     return 0;
00041 
00042   } else if (len >= 5 && (begin[0] & 0xfc) == 0xf8) {
00043     *mblen = 5;
00044     return 0;
00045 
00046   } else if (len >= 6 && (begin[0] & 0xfe) == 0xfc) {
00047     *mblen = 6;
00048     return 0;
00049 
00050   } else {
00051     *mblen = 1;
00052     return 0;
00053   }
00054 }
00055 
00056 inline unsigned short ascii_to_ucs2(const char *begin, const char *end,
00057                                     size_t *mblen) {
00058   return static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[0]);
00059 }
00060 
00061 inline unsigned short utf16be_to_ucs2(const char *begin, const char *end,
00062                                       size_t *mblen) {
00063   const size_t len = end - begin;
00064   if (len <= 1) {
00065     *mblen = 1;
00066     return 0;
00067   }
00068   *mblen = 2;
00069 #if defined WORDS_BIGENDIAN
00070   return (begin[0] << 8 | begin[1]);
00071 #else
00072   return (begin[1] << 8 | begin[0]);
00073 #endif
00074   return 0;
00075 }
00076 
00077 inline unsigned short utf16le_to_ucs2(const char *begin, const char *end,
00078                                       size_t *mblen) {
00079   const size_t len = end - begin;
00080   if (len <= 1) {
00081     *mblen = 1;
00082     return 0;
00083   }
00084   *mblen = 2;
00085 #if defined WORDS_BIGENDIAN
00086   return (begin[1] << 8 | begin[0]);
00087 #else
00088   return (begin[0] << 8 | begin[1]);
00089 #endif
00090 }
00091 
00092 inline unsigned short utf16_to_ucs2(const char *begin, const char *end,
00093                                     size_t *mblen) {
00094 #if defined WORDS_BIGENDIAN
00095   return utf16be_to_ucs2(begin, end, mblen);
00096 #else
00097   return utf16le_to_ucs2(begin, end, mblen);
00098 #endif
00099 }

00102 #ifndef MECAB_USE_UTF8_ONLY
00103 inline unsigned short euc_to_ucs2(const char *begin, const char *end,
00104                                   size_t *mblen) {
00105   const size_t len = end - begin;
00106 
00107   // JISX 0212, 0213
00108   if (static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[0]) == 0x8f && len >= 3) {
00109     unsigned short key = (static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[1]) << 8) +
00110         static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[2]);
00111     if (key < 0xA0A0) {  // offset  violation
00112       *mblen = 1;
00113       return static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[0]);
00114     }
00115     *mblen = 3;
00116     return euc_hojo_tbl[ key - 0xA0A0 ];
00117     // JISX 0208 + 0201
00118   } else if ((static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[0]) & 0x80) && len >= 2) {
00119     *mblen = 2;
00120     return euc_tbl[(static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[0]) << 8) +
00121                    static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[1]) ];
00122   } else {
00123     *mblen = 1;
00124     return static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[0]);
00125   }
00126 }
00127 
00128 inline unsigned short cp932_to_ucs2(const char *begin, const char *end,
00129                                     size_t *mblen) {
00130   const size_t len = end - begin;
00131 
00132   if ((static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[0]) >= 0xA1 &&
00133        static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[0]) <= 0xDF)) {
00134     *mblen = 1;
00135     return cp932_tbl[static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[0]) ];
00136   } else if ((static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[0]) & 0x80) && len >= 2) {
00137     *mblen = 2;
00138     return cp932_tbl[(static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[0]) << 8)
00139                      + static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[1]) ];
00140   } else {
00141     *mblen = 1;
00142     return static_cast<unsigned char>(begin[0]);
00143   }
00144 }
00145 #endif
00146 }
00147 
00148 #endif
